languages.text: По следам на крыше видно, что между ними раньше был самодельный проход

traits.locale_text: По следам на крыше видно, что между ними раньше был самодельный проход

languages.text: Судя по глубоким царапинам, раньше здесь лежало нечто вроде импровизированного моста. Если положить что-то на его место, можно попробовать перейти на другую крышу.
Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.
languages.original_text: Судя по глубоким царапинам, раньше здесь лежало нечто вроде импровизированного моста. Если положить что-то на его место, можно попробовать перейти на другую крышу.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be something like a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try walking over to the next roof.
Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be something like a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try walking over to the next roof.
Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.
Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.
Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.
Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

languages.text: 深く刻まれた跡から察するに、ここにはかつて簡易的な橋がかかっていたようだ。何か代わりになるものを置けば、向こうの屋根へ渡れるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

traits.locale_text: 深く刻まれた跡から察するに、ここにはかつて簡易的な橋がかかっていたようだ。何か代わりになるものを置けば、向こうの屋根へ渡れるかもしれない。

languages.text: Derin çiziklere bakılırsa burada derme çatma bir köprü varmış. Yerine bir şey koyarsan bir sonraki çatıya geçebilirsin.
languages.original_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

traits.locale_text: Derin çiziklere bakılırsa, burada derme çatma bir köprü varmış. Yerine bir şey koyarsan, bir sonraki çatıya geçebilirsin.

languages.text: A juzgar por las profundas marcas, aquí había un puente improvisado. Si lo pudieras sustituir, podrías intentar cruzar al siguiente tejado.
languages.original_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por las profundas marcas, aquí había un puente improvisado. Si lo pudieras sustituir, podrías intentar cruzar al siguiente tejado.

languages.text: 从深深的划痕判断，这里之前应该有一座临时搭成的桥。如果想办法把这里恢复原样，应该就能爬到隔壁的屋顶了。
languages.original_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

traits.locale_text: 从深深的划痕判断，这里之前应该有一座临时搭成的桥。如果想办法把这里恢复原样，应该就能爬到隔壁的屋顶了。

languages.text: À en juger par les profondes rainures, il y avait là une sorte de passerelle de fortune. Si vous trouvez quelque chose pour la remplacer, vous pourrez tenter de gagner le toit suivant.
languages.original_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par les profondes rainures, il y avait là une sorte de passerelle de fortune. Si vous trouvez quelque chose pour la remplacer, vous pourrez tenter de gagner le toit suivant.

languages.text: Den tiefen Kratzern nach zu urteilen, stand hier einmal eine provisorische Brücke. Wenn du sie durch etwas ersetzt, kommst du vielleicht auf das Nachbardach.
languages.original_text: Judging by the deep scratches, there used to be a makeshift bridge here. If you put something in its place, you can try to cross to the next roof.

traits.locale_text: Den tiefen Kratzern nach zu urteilen, stand hier einmal eine provisorische Brücke. Wenn du sie durch etwas ersetzt, kommst du vielleicht auf das Nachbardach.
